TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonMenuButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Menu
.class public auto ansi RibbonMenuButton extends System.Windows.Controls.Menu

summary.span: 表示功能区上单击后可显示下拉菜单的某个按钮。

span.span: Represents a button on the ribbon that displays a drop-down menu when clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了 大、中、小变体中的控件的示例，以及没有图像的控件的示例。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能区菜单按钮控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton.png "功能区菜单按钮控件")![Ribbon menu button controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton.png "Ribbon menu button controls") 功能区菜单按钮控件Ribbon menu button controls 下图显示 了打开下拉的控件。The following illustrations show controls when the drop-down is opened. ![带有拖放-关闭的功能区菜单按钮控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection.png "带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区菜单按钮控件")![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") 带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区菜单按钮控件Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open ![带有拖放-关闭的功能区菜单按钮控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection2.png "带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区菜单按钮控件")![Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-menubutton-selection2.png "Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open") 带有打开的下拉菜单的功能区菜单按钮控件Ribbon menu button control with drop-down open ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建包含三个可用项的菜单按钮的标记。The following example shows the markup to create a menu button with three available items. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButton](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubutton)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果菜单按钮位于屏幕边缘附近，菜单按钮的下方没有足够的空间，则菜单拖放将显示在菜单按钮的上方。The menu-drop is displayed above the menu button if it is near the edge of the screen and there is not enough space for it below the menu button. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须为1到3个大写字符，不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器"，用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时，将在上显示键提示 。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承一个 属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置了该 属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示，将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建增强工具提示的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增强的工具提示功能](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增强的工具提示功能")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增强的工具提示功能Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButtonTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubuttontt)]

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed in the footer of the ToolTip for this control.

value.span: 要在工具提示的脚注中显示的图像。

span.span: The image to display in the footer of the ToolTip.

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承一个 属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置了该 属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示，将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon's enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建增强工具提示的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增强的工具提示功能](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增强的工具提示功能")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增强的工具提示功能Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonMenuButtonTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbonmenubuttontt)]
